name: Green Thumb Industries Inc.
description: Green Thumb Industries Inc. (GTI) is a leading consumer packaged goods (CPG) company in the cannabis sector, dedicated to providing high-quality products to meet the evolving needs of cannabis consumers. Established in 2014 and headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, GTI operates across the United States, offering a diverse portfolio of cannabis brands and products that include flower, edibles, concentrates, and wellness products. The company's mission is to provide safe, reliable, and innovative cannabis options while promoting responsible use and education about the benefits of cannabis. GTI is committed to social equity and sustainability, actively working to support communities affected by the war on drugs and implementing environmentally sustainable practices in its operations. As a leader in the cannabis industry, GTI emphasizes quality and consistency, ensuring that all products meet rigorous testing and safety standards. The company has also expanded its footprint through strategic acquisitions and partnerships, establishing a strong presence in key markets. With a focus on innovation, GTI aims to drive the future of cannabis and improve the lives of consumers across the nation.

seo.meta_title: Green Thumb Industries Inc. | Leading Cannabis Company
seo.meta_description: Discover Green Thumb Industries Inc., a leader in the cannabis industry offering high-quality products and promoting responsible use. Explore our brands and commitment to social equity.

faq.question: What does Green Thumb Industries do?
faq.answer: Green Thumb Industries produces and sells cannabis products, including flower, edibles, and wellness items.

faq.question: Where is Green Thumb Industries headquartered?
faq.answer: GTI is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Green Thumb Industries?
faq.answer: Ben Kovler is the CEO of Green Thumb Industries Inc.

faq.question: What types of products does GTI offer?
faq.answer: GTI offers a variety of cannabis products including flower, edibles, concentrates, and wellness items.
